titleStmt.title: Ignoramus Comœdia coram Regia Maiestate Iacobi Regis Angliæ. &c.
titleStmt.author: Ruggle, George, 1575-1622.
Porta, Giambattista della, 1535?-1615. Trappolaria.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by Thomas Purfoot], impensis I. S[pencer],

notesStmt.note: Partly based on: Porta, Giambattista della. La trappolaria.
Colophon reads "Excudebat T.P. 1630."; printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
